title: Emerald Symphony Jhumka - A Touch of Tradition
materials: ivory). Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: Intricate filigree work reminiscent of traditional Telugu temple jewelry (devalayam designs). The emeralds are meticulously prong-set, surrounded by shimmering CZ stones. The delicate pearl drop adds a touch of classic elegance. The openwork design creates a light and airy feel, contrasting with the richness of the gold tone.
occasions: or adding a touch of traditional glamour to modern outfits. Ideal for events like Seemantham or Half-Saree functions.
description: This exquisite Jhumka beautifully blends traditional South Indian design with contemporary aesthetics. The high-quality simulated emeralds provide a vibrant pop of color, while the CZ accents add sparkle and brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. It's a timeless piece that can be cherished for generations.
